Thank you for applying
Dear {!Engineer_Application__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for applying for a tradesperson role at Aspect. Your application shows that you may be a good fit for us and to move forward, we'd love to conduct a quick phone interview.
To book the availability for your phone interview, please follow this link: https://calendly.com/rose-slack-aspect/wet-trade-interview
Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Kind regards,
Rose Slack Community Manager 07912 780 825
WHAT'S NEXT
1 If you don't have a valid payment method on file, you'll have received an email with a request to provide a payment method via our secure payment gateway.
2 A booking confirmation email confirming the date and arrival time of our attendance will be sent.
3 As soon as our operative is on the way to your property we'll let you know via email and text message.
4 If you need to contact us, use the blue support button below.
